price: I Iznosili on o Allahu laži ili je lud?" Naprotiv, oni koji u ahiret neće da vjeruju u patnji su i u zabludi dubokoj.
arabic: أَفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَم بِهِۦ جِنَّةُۢۗ بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلضَّلَٰلِ ٱلۡبَعِيدِ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: aftarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban am bihi jinnatun bali alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati fī al-ʿadhābi wal-ḍalāli al-baʿīdi
